title: Quarkus 1.13.1.Final released - Bugfixes
content: It has been a week since the release of 1.13.0.Final so it is time for our traditional .1 release. 1.13.1.Final is a maintenance release fixing bugs and improving the documentation. 1.13.1.Final is a safe upgrade for everyone using Quarkus 1.13. If you are not using 1.13 already, please refer to...
